name: The Mars Incident
description:
Written for the Brackeys 2020.2 Game Jam. 

Theme of "Rewind".

One week to create a game, actual development time, about 24 hours. Actual development on the core game is around 20 hours.

As a newbie operator, you are assigned to get the Mars Rover back to base, however an early incident has corrupted the command queue causing it execute the commands as it rewinds the queue. Can you think in reverse and plan your moves?

Oh, did we mention you have limited battery life left?  Make it back to the base before you run out of power... and watch out for those rocks and hills. They'll stop you cold, while  your command buffer will continue to run.  

For the really adventurous there is an Easter egg hidden on Mars. See if you can find it and still make it back to the base.
